body.name: Mini Washing Machine Portable Ultrasonic Turbine Washer, Portable Washing Machine with USB for Travel Business Trip or College Rooms
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 8 hrs 7 mins
features: Ultrasonic High Frequency: These washing machines will emit vibration waves to clean clothes, effectively remove dirt, and make your clothes clean. Suitable for light and small clothes, such as underwear, socks, etc.
Durable Materials: The mini washing machine is made of environmentally friendly ABS and TPR materials, saving water and energy, suitable for 1kg (water) personal laundry.
Lightweight and Portable: 9CM / 3.54inch in diameter, 320 grams in weight, it can be carried in a pocket or handbag.

Easy to Use: After installing the washing machine into a suitable bucket filled with water, put personal clothes and washing liquid into it, plug in and press the power button on the remote control to start automatic circulation.

Working Process: The washing machine first cleans the turbine for 2 minutes, followed by 1.5 minutes of ultrasonic vibration cleaning, and then performs bubbling cleaning for 5 minutes, repeating for about 30 minutes.

This is not a dryer

HOW TO USE: 1. Use a washing bucket or small tub (not included) & attach the washer using the suckers to the side of the bucket. 2.Fill the tub with just the right amount of water (the washing machine works more efficiently when it's near the surface) and soak light clothing, then pour in just the right amount of your favorite scrubbing liquid. 3. Once you connect the laundry power, press remote to begin combo cycle.Automatic shutdown after working for 30 minutes.
Washing vegetables, fruits and dirty dishes, it is the best choice for housewives.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Great concept but bad product
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this product because my apartment doesn't have in-unit laundry. From the first time I used it, it never started spinning immediately as it was supposed to. Instead, there were a few seconds of it just vibrating and making a ton of noise. Then, it would start spinning and alternate directions every so often to agitate the water (which is what it's supposed to do). HOWEVER, it only functioned properly for about two minutes before the motor would stop spinning the top attachment, and it would go back to making that loud vibrating sound until I would unplug it, then plug it back in, and go through the whole process all over again multiple times. So, really, it was just way more trouble than it was worth. Also, after maybe two months of attempted to make it work, the motor just completely stopped spinning the top attachment altogether. And now it's completely useless. I still love the concept of the tool, so if anyone can recommend something that actually works, let me know!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for small loads
reviews.reviewText: I thought this worked well, however it only works well for really small loads. I use it to wash my face masks and it does a great job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Don't buy this
reviews.reviewText: I honestly feel like I wasted my money because when I try to use it in my sink it didn't really do anything it has a spinning cycle and then it vibrates and it makes a little whirlpool but I had to use my tub with a little bit of water for it to kind of work because it was not working in a sink because that's what I bought it for and to me it really does not like work like a washing machine I feel like it basically this section in the spinning is not powerful enough to really wash your clothes or at least spin your clothes at all you would need to have four of these working at the same time for it to do something

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lots of work involved 🙄
reviews.reviewText: Splashes water , must use tall bucket, to much work, have to drain clothes yourself . Mini portable washing machine is a better choice

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not at all effective
reviews.reviewText: Such a disappointment. I know it was cheap, but they made some big promises in the item description, so I was hopeful. It installs just fine, and runs well until you out the clothes in the bucket. The clothing gets caught in the twisting part of them unit. I was only washing some delicates, barely enough to fill a grocery bag. But the spin of the unit pulls the clothing against the unit. Once that happens, it doesn’t spin freely. I’d have to keep a hand in the bucket the entire time for it to work effectively. Ended up returning it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I use reusable pads and wanted a more efficient way of cleaning them. This was PERFECT! Cleaned my pads so well I questioned if I'd ever had them so clean. If you use it as instructed, only a FEW, SMALL items at a time, it works like a regular washing machine. The first load, I had to remove one item because it was one too many for the current but, once removed, it ran smooth.Uses less water and is better at getting deep stains than hand-washing the items. JUST WHAT I NEEDED!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not too bad if lightly soiled
reviews.reviewText: Ok, look, I gave it two stars because it’s really not THAT bad. BUT, the power is simply not there. Tested it on a pair of my 2 yr olds socks and to be quite frank, I could have stool there sitting it with a spoon and accomplished the same result. It’s not bad if things are small and LIGHTLY soiled (without dirt) but sadly I need to return it and I RARELY return anything! Merely out of laziness

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't work as expected
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my daughter because she is potty training my grandson and this would help keep up with the accidents in his underwear. The motor is not that strong, ut doesn'teveb priduce suds, the device does not stay suctioned on any item. We tried the sink in the kitchen, bathroom and a small bucket. This was not worth the money.
